name: items
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool hacker_news.
Tool description: This is the first iteration of YCombinator's Hacker News API which provides read only access to Hacker News data near real-time, including stories, comments, user data, top stories, etc.
API description: Stories, comments, Ask HNs and polls are considered items identified by ids (unique integers)

is_id.description: The item ID for which details are to be fetched.
